response.summary:
I am currently working in a manufacture and engineed design companies, centered in the plastic and chemical processes for construction products machines. I design and implement automation systems for machines like packing systems, mixers, machines for plastic...
I studied mechatronic engineering, through my studies I have learnt programming in different languages such as java, C and assembler, and I have used them in software as MatLab, NXC, Arduino, CodeWarrior, Dev-C++, Eclipse, Qt Creator and the openCV library for computer vision. I have strong bases in mathematics, probability, statistics and signal analysis due to courses I have taken in the university. I made a master in MEchanical Engineer working with fault detection in electric variable speed drives.
I have general knowledge in modeling dynamic systems and I studied some biological systems, specifically epidemiological ones. I took part in the 2013 Undergraduate Data Palooza Research Contest developing a graphic representation of the cases of malaria reported since 1952 and its spatial dispersion. 
I have developed subject's projects like the control of a ball and beam mechanism, a car that runs a maze for the microcontrollers subject, and a a serial robot with 5 degrees of freedom for the robotics fundamentals class.
I worked for two years, since June 2014, in a company that commercializes equipment and supplies for ophthalmology. I have developed skills regarding dealing with the customers, customer service, time management, and teamwork with different areas of the company. I have improved my communication skills in English due the relationship with different companies around the world as Abbott, Moria and Oculus.
response.skills: Siemens Tia Portal, Vijeo Designer, IspSoft, DopSoft, EcoStruxure Machine Expert – Basic, EasyBuilder Pro, Solid Edge, QElectrotech, AutoCAD Electrical, LibreOffice, Scilab, SAT, FAT, Electrical Wiring, Programmable Logic Controller (PLC), HMI Programming, HMI Design, Piping and Instrumentation Drawing (P&ID), Matlab, Microsoft Office

company.name: Thales Digital Identity and Security (ex Gemalto)
company.description: Thales Digital Identity & Security is a global leader in digital security, bringing trust to an increasingly connected world. We design and deliver a wide range of products, software and services based on two core technologies: digital identification and data protection. Our technology is at the heart of modern life, from payment to enterprise security and the internet of things. It enables our clients to deliver secure digital services for billions of individuals and things. We are part of the Thales group, a €19bn international organization with more than 80,000 employees in 68 countries worldwide.
